text: Dark Bar is a 1989 Italian drama film directed by Stelio Fiorenza as Stanley Florency and starring Marina Suma. ==Plot== Italy, late 1980s. In a night club called "Dark Bar", where customers are used to consume drugs, a young girl is found dead. Anne, her sister, decides to find out the murderess. ==Cast== * Marina Suma as Anna * Richard Hatch as Marco * Barbara Cupisti as Elisabeth * Alessandra Stordy as Wilma * Lea Martino as Enza * Olivia Cupisti as Lubka * James Sampson as James * Vincent Regina ==Release== The film was released in Italy on December 12, 1989 ==See also== * List of Italian films of 1989 ==Notes== ==External links== * Category:1989 films Category:Italian films Category:Italian drama films Category:1989 drama films Category:Films scored by Carlo Siliotto
title: Dark Bar
